text.language: Pouro n~te ]hir/n/: moi nan n~tekhir/n/: cemni nan n~tekhir/n/: ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
O King of peace, grant us Your peace, establish for us Your peace, and forgive us our sins.

language.div: Ya Raja damai, beri kami damai-Mu, tetapkan damai Mu, dan ampuni dosa-dosa kami.

text.language: ياملك السلام أعطنا سلامك قرر لنا سلامك واغفر لنا خطايانا.
